overview: A brilliant but deranged neurosurgeon becomes obsessively fixated on a judge's daughter. With the help of an escaped criminal whose face he has surgically deformed, the mad man lures her, her father, and her fianc√© to his isolated castle-like home, where he has created a torture chamber with the intent of torturing them for having 'tortured' him.
tagline: The uncanny master of make-up in a new amazing shocker
title: The Raven
